item.title: Report X-2023081616
item.description:
Report X-2023081616

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-21
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Tape failed on the bottom closures prompting the pkg to be sent to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. Upon inspection of the carton interior it was discovered a small amount of liquid had leaked wetting only the inside of the carton and dried droplets were found on the inner containers. The pkg and contents were placed in a lined Hazmat bin when the failure of the closures was found and the pkg remains in the bin at this time. DescribePack: Loose caps on 2 x 2.5 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023081202
item.description:
Report X-2023081202

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet, damaged package was unloaded from trailer and immediately removed from workflow. Package was left in front of QA cage for inspection. Package was placed in a plastic tote. DescribePack: Bottle caps are loose, leaked during transport. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of corrosive liquid.

item.description:
Report X-2023081174

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking pkg was found during loading. Pkg was placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the Hazmat Processing Area for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 4 x 1 gal plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.
